title: Great Bread Machine Recipes
description: Savor these 67 breads from around the world--and make them in your bread machine. From American loaves like Adobe to Portuguese Corn Bread, each recipe is converted by a special formula that you can use to convert your own favorites. Special diet recipes include salt-free, low-calorie and yeast-free breads. "With recipes for everything from plain white bread to pumpernickel; peanut butter and jelly bread to zucchini bread; a veritable Baskin and Robbins of bread recipes."--Money Savers. 128 pages, 6 x 9.
author: Norman A. Garrett
